src:
Lutte simple / Demi-finale : Pakala sort un redoutable plaquage à Nguél Dionne
04 Nov 2019 by Dakaractu




Dans ce gala de lutte simple organisé par Jack's production, ce dimanche au terrain Gaal-gui, le redoutable lutteur, Pakala qui croisait Nguél Dionne en demi-finale des poids lourds, s'est imposé. Fidèle à sa réputation de bon lutteur traditionnel, le Mbourois a sorti un terrible plaquage pour terrasser son vis a vis et rejoindre la finale...
text:
Single fight / Semi-final: Pakala releases a formidable tackle at Nguél Dionne
04 Nov 2019 by Dakaractu




In this simple wrestling gala organized by Jack's production, this Sunday at the Gaal-gui pitch, the fearsome wrestler, Pakala, who crossed Nguél Dionne in the heavyweight semifinals, won the day. True to his reputation as a good traditional wrestler, the Mbourois has released a terrible tackle to overcome his opposite and join the final ...
